item.title: Disney+ Launches ‘Homerpalooza’ Streaming Hub, With More Than 200 Homer Simpson-Centric Episodes
item.description: Disney+ is doubling down on donuts, Duffs and d’ohs. The streamer has added a stream called “HOMERPALOOZA!” to its offerings this week — a limited-time, round-the-clock feed featuring 200 episodes ded
